source.b67875bd:
from sklearn.feature_extraction.text import CountVectorizer

cv = CountVectorizer(list(train['Review'].astype(str)))
vector = cv.fit_transform(list(train['Review'].astype(str)))

columns = sorted(cv.vocabulary_.keys(), key = cv.vocabulary_.get)
bow = pd.DataFrame(vector.toarray(), columns = columns)

corr_rating = bow.corrwith(train['Rating'], method = 'spearman').sort_values(ascending = False)
corr_recommended = bow.corrwith(train['Recommended'], method = 'spearman').sort_values(ascending = False)
